subtitle__00015: Did she mention me?She wants to know why you tie the towel around your head.It's a leave-in conditioner, okay?It's a leave-in conditioner.-You got a second? -Sure, sure.Come on...-...in. -Hello, sweetheart.What you guys doing here?We are here to break up with you.Both of you?We think you're a horrible person, and bad things should happen to you.I'm sorry. caption__00016:
Certainly! The video you provided is a scene from the TV show "Friends," specifically Season 2, Episode 14 - "The One with Mrs. Drubner."
In this episode, Phoebe Buffay (Lisa Kudrow) and Monica Geller (Courteney Cox) are at Central Perk coffee shop when they spot an old woman who looks familiar to them. They soon realize that she's their former high school teacher, Mrs. Farber.
Mrs. Farber has come back into their lives because her son Jason Castalano (played by Elliott Gould), whom one of the friends had dated in college, needs medical attention after choking on his retainer while drunk. As he recovers in the hospital room next door, Mrs. Farber visits each friend individually for support during what turns out to be a family emergency involving Mr. Castelanos health issues as well. During these conversations between characters like Rachael Green(Jennifer Aniston), Joanna Tribbiani-Geller (Christina Applegate), Chandler Bing ( Matthew Perry)....the camera cuts away frequently enough so viewers can infer some things about how those interactions went without being privy directly too much information; however., it becomes clear why exactly everyone finds themselves feeling uncomfortable around someone else: there may have been past conflicts or misunderstandings among certain individuals within group dynamics which still linger even years later despite attempts made towards reconciliation earlier season episodes.)
subtitle__00016: Honey, sweetheart, look. Just give me another chance.We'll start over. We'll go back to Aruba.What is it with you and Aruba? Do you have a deal with the airlines?What do you say?Dr. Farber, we've got an emergency here.Jason Castalano 's choking on his retainer.Oh, God. I'll be right there, Bernice.Look, please don't go anywhere.I'll be right back.Okay, and we'll be here, hating you.See how he was sweating when he walked out?If I'm hogging the ball, you jump right in there......and take some punches. This feels great.I'm pretty sure I'm still gonna marry him.What are you talking about?Mindy, the guy is the devil.He is Satan in a smock.I know he's not perfect.But the truth is at the end of the day, I still really wanna be...... Mrs. Dr. Barry Farber...... D. D.S.Oh, God.I hope you can find a way to be happy for me.And I hope you'll still be my maid of honor.
